alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 10 at 2:33PM MDT until April 10 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Far Northeast Highlands and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 8 PM MDT this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines in some areas. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
